extensionAttribute.description: Returns the installed version of Apple Loops
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/bash
ExtensionVersion=""
if [ -f /usr/local/bin/appleLoops.py ]; then ExtensionVersion=$(python /usr/local/bin/appleLoops.py --version | cut -d' ' -f3) fi
if [ "$ExtensionVersion" == "" ]; then ExtensionVersion="Not Installed" fi
echo "<result>$ExtensionVersion</result>"
exit 0
